mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry(inquiryNum, userId, subject, content) VALUES (#{inquiryNum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM inquiry i JOIN memberInfo m On i.userId=m.userId

SELECT inquiryNum, i.userId, nickName, subject, content, i.created FROM inquiry i JOIN memberInfo m ON i.userId=m.userId
ORDER BY inquiryNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT inquiryNum, i.userId, nickName, subject, content, i.created FROM inquiry i JOIN memberInfo m ON i.userId=m.userId WHERE inquiryNum=#{inquiryNum}

SELECT inquiryNum, subject FROM inquiry i JOIN memberInfo m ON i.userId=m.userId
AND(inquiryNum > #{inquiryNum})
ORDER BY inquiryNum ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT inquiryNum, subject FROM inquiry i JOIN memberInfo m ON i.userId=m.userId
AND (inquiryNum < #{inquiryNum})
ORDER BY inquiryNum DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE inquiryNum=#{inquiryNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiryFile(inquiryNum, saveFilename, originalFilename,FileSize) VALUES (#{inquiryNum}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
